i1.name: Divine_Ascent
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Kayle''' ascends through four forms that each grant additional bonuses. She ascends upon spending a skill point at [[Experience (champion)|levels]] 1, 6, 11, and 16.

{{sbc|Level 1 - Zealous:}} '''Kayle's''' basic attacks {{tip|on-attack}} generate a stack of ''Zeal'' that lasts 5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times. For each stack, she gains {{sti|attack speed|{{as|6%|attack speed}} {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}, up to a maximum {{sti|attack speed|{{as|30%|attack speed}}}} {{as|(+ 5% per 100 AP)}}. At max stacks, she becomes ''Exalted'', gaining {{sti|ms|{{as|8% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}.
{{sbc|Level 6 - Arisen:}} '''Kayle''' becomes {{tip|ranged}} and gains {{sti|range|350 '''bonus''' attack range}} for a total of {{sti|range|525}}.

{{sbc|Level 11 - Aflame:}} While '''Kayle''' is ''Exalted'', her basic attacks {{tip|on-attack}} also launch a ''wave'' of fire forward that deals {{as|{{pp|type=[[File:Starfire Spellblade.png|20px|link=]] Starfire Spellblade's Rank|15;15 to 35 for 5|0 to 5}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' AD)}} {{as|(+ 25% AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies it passes through. The ''wave'' is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
{{sbc|Level 16 - Transcendent:}} '''Kayle''' gains an additional {{sti|range|100 '''bonus''' attack range}} for a total of {{sti|range|625}}, and permanently gains the full effects of ''Zealous''.
i1.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Kayle ascends through four forms that each grant additional bonuses. She ascends upon spending a skill point at Experience (champion) 1, 6, 11, and 16.
Level 1 - Zealous: Kayle's basic attacks on-attack generate a stack of Zeal that lasts 5 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent hits and stacks up to 5 times. For each stack, she gains 6% (+ 1% per 100 AP) bonus attack speed, up to a maximum 30% (+ 5% per 100 AP). At max stacks, she becomes Exalted, gaining 8% bonus movement speed.
Level 6 - Arisen: Kayle becomes ranged and gains 350 bonus attack range for a total of 525.
Level 11 - Aflame: While Kayle is Exalted, her basic attacks on-attack also launch a wave of fire forward that deals 0 to 5 â€’ undefined (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 25% AP) magic damage to all enemies it passes through. The wave is affected by critical strike modifiers.
Level 16 - Transcendent: Kayle gains an additional 100 bonus attack range for a total of 625, and permanently gains the full effects of Zealous.
i1.notes:
'''Zealous'''
* The stacking attack speed can be tracked in the HUD via a buff called [[File:Zealous.png|20px|link=]] '''Zeal''', while the maximum stacks bonus grants the buff [[File:Divine Ascent.png|20px|link=]] '''Exalted'''.
* Subsequent applications will also refresh the duration of all stacks, but all of them are lost when expired.
* If '''Kayle''' is in her attack animation after the stacks expire, she gains another {{fd|0.5}} seconds to refresh/stack [[File:Zealous.png|20px|link=]] '''Zeal'''.
* Each stack increase attack speed based on the amount of ability power '''Kayle''' has at the time the stack is acquired and will not update if it is changed.
** For example, if a stack acquired while she has no ability power, it will the increase attack speed by {{sti|attack speed|{{as|6%|attack speed}}}}. If {{sti|ability power|{{as|200|ability power}}}} acquired afterwards, the next stack will grant {{sti|attack speed|{{as|8%|attack speed}}}}. The two increased attack speed by {{sti|attack speed|{{as|14%|attack speed}}}} (6 + 8) and not {{sti|attack speed|{{as|16%|attack speed}}}} (8 + 8).
'''Arisen'''
* Basic attacks within {{sti|range|175}} will still use '''Kayle's''' melee basic attack animations and do not utilize {{tip|projectile|projectiles}}.
** They are still classified as {{tip|ranged}} attacks.
** Due to this fact, projectile blocking effects cannot intercept basic attacks while '''Kayle's''' target is within her "melee" range.
'''Aflame'''
* Basic attacks against [[structures]] do not trigger fire waves.
* While at 4 stacks of [[File:Zealous.png|20px|link=]] '''Zeal''', the next {{tip|on-attack}} reaching the fifth stack will be empowered by {{sbc|Aflame}}, releasing the first fire wave.
'''Transcendent'''
* [[File:Zealous.png|20px|link=]] '''Zeal''' and [[File:Divine Ascent.png|20px|link=]] '''Exalted''' buffs swapped to a new buff that grants the benefit of both and it is not visible on Kayle's HUD.
* This buff also updates its {{as|attack speed}} value whenever a {{tt|stat update|A stat update happens once every 0.25 seconds.}} happens and {{as|ability power}} is changed, however, it does not track {{as|ability power}} from other buffs, unless they have been specifically special cased. The following buffs are not special cased yet and will not grant bonus {{as|attack speed}}:
** [[Rune]]s (including [[File:Rune shard Adaptive Force.png|20px|link=Runes Reforged#Shards]] [[Runes Reforged#Shards|Adaptive Force rune shards]] )
** {{bi|Infernal Might}}
** {{cai|W|Yuumi}}
'''Fire Waves Details'''
* [[File:Celestine Wish Kayle Fire Wave.png|thumb|Hitboxes shows by a graph side by side.]] A wave consists of three projectiles for the hitbox and a fourth for visuals.
* The hitbox projectiles spawn 75 units behind '''Kayle''', travel through her, and are destroyed once they've traveled 850 units. Their technical details are:
** {{sbc|Range:}} {{tip|cr|850}} (755 effective)
** {{sbc|Width:}} {{tip|er|200}}
** {{sbc|Projectile Speed:}} 2800
** {{sbc|Angle:}} 18{{degree}} (left and right at 9{{degree}} to their side, respectively)
* {{tip|Projectile}} blocking effects can block each projectile individually.
** It is possible to block the visuals, but still get hit by an unblocked "invisible" hitbox projectile.
* Hitting an enemy with multiple projectiles of the same wave will not increase the damage dealt.
* The fire wave shares {{tip|cast instance}} with the triggering basic attack.
** The amount of {{ri|Conqueror}} stacks gained will be {{rd|2|1}} if the basic attack deals damage first or 2 if the wave does so.
* Keep in mind that it's still two damage instances. If one triggers {{ri|Bone Plating}}, the other's damage will be blocked.
* Fire waves roll {{tip|critical strike|critical strike chance}} on each target hit individually.
* The distance of the fire waves scales with '''bonus''' attack range.
* A known issue is that despite dealing {{tip|area damage|area spell damage}} the fire wave does not:
** consume {{nie|Mana Charge}} from {{ii|Tear of the Goddess}} and its upgrades,
** or trigger {{ri|Manaflow Band}}.
'''Interactions & Other'''
* Because '''Kayle''' is both a {{tip|melee}} and {{tip|ranged}} champion, she can purchase both ranged and melee exclusive items at anytime, but their effects will function depending on her current range type; the same principle also applies to [[runes]].
** However, keep in mind that, prior to ascending to ''Arisen'', {{ai|Starfire Spellblade|Kayle}} also changes this behaviour based on its usage.
* Waves are fired in the direction that '''Kayle''' is facing. Changing that during the attack windup via {{si|Flash}} will also change the direction of the wave.
* Each ascension has an unique animation and a voice line. ''([[Kayle/LoL/Audio|See: Kayle's quotes]])''
* The ascensions' animation will override the current one, but it does not cancel '''Kayle's''' current action, nor her previous orders.

q1.name: Radiant_Blast
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' conjures a portal in front of her that faces the target direction. After a {{rutngt|0.25}}-second delay, a celestial sword launches forward from it.

The sword expands upon hitting an enemy. Targets struck are dealt {{as|magic damage}}, {{tip|slow|slowed}} for 2 seconds, and suffer 15% '''reduced''' {{sti|lethality|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance}}}} for 4 seconds.
q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kayle conjures a portal in front of her that faces the target direction. After a 0.264-second delay, a celestial sword launches forward from it.
The sword expands upon hitting an enemy. Targets struck are dealt magic damage, slowed for 2 seconds, and suffer 15% reduced armor and magic resistance for 4 seconds.
q1.notes: '''Details''' * The portal is created at the start of the cast time and the cast delay represents the amount of time the portal needs to spawn and launch the projectile, which is {{rutngt|0.25}}. ** The portal does not follow '''Kayle's''' movement, using {{si|Flash}} or getting displaced won't change its position nor direction. * The cast time is equal to the windup time of '''Kayle's''' basic attacks and can be calculated by dividing her ''windup percent'' value ({{fd|0.193555}}) with the current total attack speed. ** ''Radiant Blast's'' cast time is {{rutngt|0.30968}} at base attack speed, is at most {{rutngt|0.96775}} at the minimum attack speed of {{sti|attack speed|{{as|0.2|attack speed}}}}, and is {{rutngt|0.07742}} at the attack speed cap of {{sti|attack speed|{{as|2.5|attack speed}}}}. ** Various effects, such as {{ri|Lethal Tempo}}, allow the player to bypass this limit, further decreasing the cast time. ** Additionally it should be noted that, due to actions only taking place on whole game ticks, the cast time can only be changed in fractions of {{fd|0.033}} seconds. This also means that the lowest possible cast time is {{fd|0.033}} seconds, requiring at least {{sti|attack speed|{{as|5.8652|attack speed}}}} attack speed. ** {{correction}} Important to note that in patch [[V9.17]], ''Radiant Blast's'' cast time was changed to be a flat {{fd|0.25}} seconds, rather than scaling with the attack windup time. In patch [[V10.4]], this was undocumentedly changed back. Whether the change to scale with windup time again was intentional or not is unknown. * The expansion consist of 5 hitboxes, forming a cross-like shape centered 100 units ahead from the impact in its direction. Their technical data can be seen below and visualized on the image to the right. [[File:Celestine Wish Kayle_Q_Explosion.png|thumb|The left side shows projectile's width and the total area traveled if it does not hit a target, while the right side shows the explosions when it hits a target.]] ** ExplosionCenter: 100 radius ** ExplosionLeft: 150 distance, 125 width ** ExplosionRight: 150 distance, 125 width ** ExplosionBackward: 100 distance, 90 width ** ExplosionForward: 400 distance, 90 width * The resistance reduction is applied after the damage has been dealt. '''Interactions & Other''' * The visual effects of the explosion shows the blade and guard of '''Kayle's''' swords. * The resistance reduction can be tracked on the HUD as a debuff called [[File:Radiant Blast 2.png|20px|link=]] '''Sundered'''. * {{Correction}} Note that the [[File:Kayle PsyOpsCircle.png|32px]] PsyOps skin still uses the old shred VFX, which also only shows for 3 seconds (effect duration is not affected). This is possibly an oversight as all existing and at the time released skins were updated properly in [[V11.18]]. [[File:Celestine_Wish_Kayle_PsyOps_Shred_Indicator_Issue.mp4]]

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 60% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP)
  • Slow: %

w1.name: Celestial_Blessing
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' and the target allied champion are {{tip|heal|healed}} and gain {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} for 2 seconds.

If cast without a valid target, or [[self-targeted|self-cast]], ''Celestial Blessing'' will automatically target the closest allied champion in range, prioritizing the one with the lowest {{sti|{{as|health}}}}.
w1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kayle and the target allied champion are healed and gain bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
If cast without a valid target, or self-targeted, Celestial Blessing will automatically target the closest allied champion in range, prioritizing the one with the lowest health.
leveling:
{{st|Heal|{{ap|60 to 180}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
{{st|Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|24 to 40}}% {{as|(+ 8% per 100 AP)}}}}
w1.notes:
'''Details'''
* ''Celestial Blessing's'' cast time does not interrupt movement and the effects are applied at the start.
'''Interactions & Other'''
* If cast with [[Auto-targeted|auto-targeting]], ''Celestial Blessing'' may target allies who are {{tip|untargetable|untargetable}}, or allied clones that cannot be targeted by allies (such as {{cai|Warrior Trickster|Wukong}}).

effects.str:
• Heal: (+ 30% AP)
  • Bonus Movement Speed: % (+ 8% per 100 AP)

e1.name: Starfire_Spellblade
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Kayle''' deals {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}}. The ''waves'' from {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle}} have base damage equal to this effect's base damage.

{{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' kindles her blade, empowering her next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds to have an {{tip|uncancelable windup}} and deal additional {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} {{tip|on-hit}} that is capped at 400 against {{tip|monsters}}. If '''Kayle''' is not yet ''{{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Arisen}}'', this attack becomes {{tip|ranged}} with {{sti|range|525 range}}.

{{sbc|{{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Aflame}} Bonus:}} The attack explodes upon the target, dealing its damage to surrounding enemies and applying {{tip|on-hit}} effects. This is affected by {{tip|critical strike}} modifiers.
''Starfire Spellblade'' {{tip|basic attack reset|resets}} '''Kayle's''' basic attack timer.
e1.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Kayle deals bonus magic damage on-hit. The waves from Kayle's Divine Ascent have base damage equal to this effect's base damage.
Active: Kayle kindles her blade, empowering her next basic attack within 6 seconds to have an uncancelable windup and deal additional bonus magic damage on-hit that is capped at 400 against monsters. If Kayle is not yet Kayle's Arisen, this attack becomes ranged with 525 range.
Kayle's Aflame Bonus: The attack explodes upon the target, dealing its damage to surrounding enemies and applying on-hit effects. This is affected by critical strike modifiers.
Starfire Spellblade resets Kayle's basic attack timer.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|8 to 12}}% {{as|(+ 2% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''missing''' health}}}}
e1.notes:
'''Details'''
* ''Starfire Spellblade'' will be buffered and cast when the cooldown ends if the player attempts to cast it within 0.1 seconds of the cooldown ending.
* ''Starfire Spellblade'' consist of 3 parts, each dealing different type of damage source type:
** The basic attack part deals {{tip|basic damage|basic}}.
** The passive's on-hit effect deals {{tip|proc damage|proc}}.
** The active's portion deals {{tip|spell damage|spell}}.
** Additionally, the damage against secondary targets caught in the explosion is also tagged as [[area of effect]]. 
* The basic attack and the active's portion shares the same {{tip|cast instance}} since patch [[V11.1]]. (Exception: {{ii|Muramana}}, see under '''Interactions & Other'''.)
* Parry interactions:
** {{tip|Blind}}: The main target will never receive damage, but the secondary targets will receive the active's spell damage.
** {{tip|Block}}: Blocking will always negate all damage. Keep in mind that if a secondary target is outside of {{ais|Spirit's Refuge|Shen}} zone, they won't block damage.
** {{tip|Dodge}}: Dodging will always negate all damage.
* {{pending for test}}: All parry interactions are marked for retesting because of patch [[V11.1]] changes.
'''Interactions & Other'''
* While the active's effect is up, a circle is visible to '''Kayle''', indicating her {{sti|range}}, however, this circle only takes into account {{ais|Divine Ascent|Kayle}} effect on her range, not other sources such as {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}}.
** The increased range (with the item's effect included) will be {{sti|range|675}} prior to ascending to {{sbc|Transcendent}}, after which it's {{sti|range|725}}.
* To clarify the description, ''Starfire Spellblade'' can behave both as a {{tip|ranged}} and {{tip|melee}} attack based on how far the target is prior to '''Kayle''' ascending to {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Arisen}}, after which the attack will be always using ranged standards.
** If the target is 200 units away or closer, the attack will be considered melee. This also uses her melee animations, not utilizing projectiles even after ascending.
** If the target is over 200 units, the attack will be considered ranged.
* To further expand on this: Using the ranged empowered attack will change '''Kayle's''' range type to ranged while the projectile is alive. This means that if the target could outrun the projectile, '''Kayle''' would be stuck on being ranged, although the bonuses from the active are not kept. While it's unlikely to be on this temporary ranged state for longer than half a seconds during a normal playthrough, it is possible to achieve few seconds when specific conditions are met.
* Keep in mind that while on-hit effects will be applied to all targets in the explision, {{tip|on-attack}} effects are only applied once per basic attack, not per target hit.
* Single-use on-hits, such as {{tip|Spellblade}}, will be applied to the main target.
** If the main target died prior to the projectile reaching them, or if it was a [[Jungle plants|jungle plant]], the effects will be applied to the closest target from the explosion's center.
* {{iis|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} {{nie|Phantom Hit}} can only be applied to the main target.
* Despite being one cast instance, ''Starfire Spellblade'' triggers {{iis|Muramana}} {{nie|Shock}} twice on each target, dealing normal bonus damage after the basic attack and increased bonus damage after the spell, totalling at {{as|{{as|{{rd|{{fd|5}}%|{{fd|4.2}}%}} '''maximum''' mana}} {{as|(+ 6% AD)}} '''bonus''' physical damage|physical damage}}.

effects.str: • Passive Damage: (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 20% AP)
• Bonus Magic Damage: % (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's missing health

st_slices: % (+ 2% per 100 AP) of target's missing health

r1.name: Divine_Judgment
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Kayle''' grants herself or the target allied champion {{tip|invulnerable|invulnerability}} for a few seconds once the cast time begins, conjuring swords of fire and telegraphing the area around the target.
Upon completing the cast time, the swords rain down around the target, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies.
''Divine Judgment'' will prioritize casting on allies over '''Kayle'''.
r1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Kayle grants herself or the target allied champion invulnerability for a few seconds once the cast time begins, conjuring swords of fire and telegraphing the area around the target.
Upon completing the cast time, the swords rain down around the target, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
Divine Judgment will prioritize casting on allies over Kayle.
r1.notes:
'''Details'''
* ''Divine Judgment's'' cast time does not interrupt movement.
** The cast time will finish even after '''Kayle's''' death.
** Because {{tip|raw damage|internalraw}} damage ignores invulnerability, the target may still die via {{tip|Nexus Obelisk}}, but the ability will finish at their corpse's position regardless.
* ''Divine Judgment'' can be cast on {{tip|clone|clones}} too, including {{ai|Shapesplitter|Neeko}} and {{ai|Warrior Trickster|Wukong}}, which are normally untargetable for allies.
* While it's uncommon occurence, it is possible to cast ''Divine Judgment'' on targets who just entered {{tip|resurrection}} or {{tip|zombie state}}. This is only possible with very strict timing and perhaps high latency.
** It's recommended to avoid this interaction, as this renders the usage of ''Divine Judgment'' useless in many cases.
* Prior to becoming {{sbc|Transcended}}, casting ''Divine Judgment'' refreshes the duration of {{ai|Zealous|Kayle}} stacks.
* If casted on herself, '''Kayle's''' basic {{stil|attack range|link=range}} is reduced to 400 during ''Divine Judgment's'' cast time to bring her within the effective range of the ability if attack commands are issued on an enemy.
* The area around the target does not appear if the target is not {{tip|sight|visible}} to the enemies' point of view.
* While the target is {{tip|invulnerable}}, a number indicator will appear beneath them whenever they would receive damage to show the amount that was entirely mitigated. This is calculated pre-mitigation, or before resistances and reductions are taken into account.
'''Interactions & Other'''
* {{iis|Rapid Firecannon}} {{nie|Energized}} behaves strangely with the set basic attack range, causing it to go from {{sti|range|400}} to {{sti|range|385}} over 4 {{tt|stat updates|A stat update occurs every 0.264 seconds.}}. (So 400 - 390 - 387 - 385)
** Upon completing the cast time, the proper range needs 2 updates to set in. ({{sti|range|660}} - {{sti|range|675}} while {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Arisen}}; {{sti|range|710}} - {{sti|range|725}} while {{ai|Divine Ascent|Kayle|Transcended}})
** Gaining ''Energized'' during the cast time will cause the range to cycle between {{sti|range|525}} and {{sti|range|550}} until the cast time finishes and set to the proper range after 1 update.
** Selling {{ii|Rapid Firecannon}} during the cast time sets the range to be {{sti|range|250}}
* The {{tip|invulnerable|invulnerability}} can be tracked on the HUD as a buff called [[File:Divine Judgment.png|20px|link=]] '''Intervention'''.

effects.str: • Magic Damage: (+ 100% bonus AD) (+ 80% AP)
